sentences: Hans Aksel Andersen  (19 March 1912 – 18 November 1977) was a Danish classical organist, composer and professor of music.
Aksel Andersen was born in Ruskin, Nebraska.
In Denmark, he was a pupil in Varde under Svend-Ove Møller (1903-1949), organist at Viborg Cathedral .
Andersen would later become an exam organist at the Royal Danish Academy of Music in 1931.
